text.__SUMMARY__: Ulmus macrocarpa var. glabra Nie & Huang is restricted to mixed forest in the Chinese province of Heilongjang.
text.Description: The tree is distinguished by a "leaf blade subelliptic, smooth, with tufted hairs in vein axil, base oblique, apex acuminate to narrowly acuminate. Samara smooth, glabrous, wings thin. Fl. Apr.–May, fr. May.–Jun".
text.Cultivation:
The tree is not known to be in cultivation beyond China.
